Introduction

Choi Taeyang, known under his stage name Theo, is a South Korean singer-songwriter, dancer, and composer under FNC Entertainment. He is best known as the oldest member and the lead vocalist of the boy group P1Harmony.

On September 16, 2020, Theo was revealed as the sixth and last member of P1Harmony. The group officially debuted on October 28, 2020, with their first mini-album "Disharmony : Stand Out".
